title: I Cannot View Streaming Media, Why?
answer:
Some browsers, such as UC Browser (UCWEB), do not support streaming media.  
If you want to view streaming media, open a browser that supports streaming media.  
If you have set a browser that does not support streaming media as your default browser,  
perform the following steps:  
   1. Touch > Settings > Applications > Manage applications.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/1-120423140936.PNG)

   2. Touch All, then touch the browser you have set as your default browser.  
The following figure assumes that UCWEB has been set as your default browser.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/2-120423140956.PNG)

   3. Touch Clear defaults.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/resource/Image/3-120423141017.PNG)
